content.raw:
The specular component we're setting through SDF is only affecting the "color" of the specular highlight and the 4th value is used as alpha instead of shininess. We don't currently have a way to set shininess via SDF.

We are however setting the shininess value when loading from a dae or obj mesh. 

There was an effort to define new SDF specs that use more modern shading techniques for specifying visual material properties, and that include the ability for users to specify material shininess / glossiness values.  There hasn't been much progress on it recently though..
